thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 9 of 1759
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: I must admit that at first I was having some concerns, largely in part due to my mistakes when booking some flights to the Philippines. I contacted Flighthub to discuss some of my concerns and was initially encountering some pushback by the travel coordinator. Not that it was his fault. He was very polite. I requested that I speak with his supervisor who was also very polite and courteous. At the end of the day I made some mistakes when booking my flights. I acknowledged my mistakes and, in turn, I feel Flighthub did what they could to make it right. The people I spoke with were polite and helpful.
